summary: Build a Home Health Care Services app focused on Chennai.

existing_features.title: Create the core user flows for a Home Health Care Services app focused on Chennai: browse services, view service details, and submit a booking request.
Add frontend pages/components for: Home (Chennai-focused landing), Services (search/filter), Service Details, and Booking form; wire them to the backend using React Query.

Add a coherent visual theme appropriate for a healthcare services marketplace (English UI text), and apply it consistently across layout, typography, and components without using a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add static generated image assets (logo and hero illustration) and display them in the UI (no backend image routing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Home Health Care Services app tailored for users in Chennai (service discovery and booking).
Implement backend data models and APIs to support service discovery and booking requests, with persistent storage in the single Motoko actor.
Pre-populate the backend with additional service packages so the Services page shows a larger catalog without requiring manual service creation.

projectName: Home Health Care Services app for Chennai (service discovery + booking)
